variants.Description in input context: A104T mutation reduces thermal stability of DJ-1 by introducing water and disorder into the protein core
E163K mutation disrupts a critical salt bridge in DJ-1 structure
M26I mutation causes packing defects in DJ-1 protein structure

Material used.Description: Thermal unfolding experiments performed on recombinant DJ-1 proteins

Readout description.Result Description: A104T shows decreased melting temperature compared to wild-type
E163K exhibits altered thermal denaturation profile
M26I demonstrates lower thermal stability in unfolding experiments
